Class ExtSocDisplayModelServer

public class ExtSocDisplayModelServer
extends DisplayModelServer

This class prepares swing display models based on the external society currently loaded by the application.

1.0

Parameters:
app - Pointer to the LiaisonAdminToolController (application shell) that is creating it. This provides access to all public data structures.
Method Detail

loadNewSet

public void loadNewSet(ExtSocietySet theSet)
This may be badly named. This is the method to be invoked whenver a new external society set is loaded. It generates all necessary Swing Models

getTreeRoot

public javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode getTreeRoot(ALPAgentReference alpRef)
Get the root node of the external tree for the specified ALP agent reference. Remember that there is a separate external tree for each ALP Agent reference, the the current selection in the ALP Tree determines which is shown in teh external tree.

getMainExtSocListModel

public javax.swing.ComboBoxModel getMainExtSocListModel()
This method produces a list model that will display a list of accessable external societies.

buildMainWindowExtTrees

public void buildMainWindowExtTrees()
This method builds all the external trees needed for a newly loaded external society. The tree list models get a lot more confusing for the external tree, because the external tree is built from LSRs according to the ALPAgentReference selected. Therefore, I don't have one root node, but rather a whole set of them based on the selected ALP Agent.
